summary: Ensure all test activity cases are covered in integration tests, including all ActivityResult variants and heartbeat timeout scenarios on the workflow side.
userImpact: Incomplete test coverage may leave activity functionality untested and undiscovered issues in production.
resolutionDetails: Integration tests were completed covering all ActivityResult variants and heartbeat timeout scenarios.
keyQuote: Get all of the cases from the test activities covered. Make sure to test all of the ActivityResult variants on the workflow side and heartbeat timeout on the workflow side.
